hotswitcher.configGui.title: Hot Switcher Config
hotswitcher.configGui.swapBarCount.title: Swap Hot Bar Count
hotswitcher.configGui.enableHotbarInCont: Make Hotbar Keybinds Usable in Containers

Enabling this allow you to change the active hotbar slot when a container is open. Both the scroll wheel and the hotbar keybinds should work, but if the keys would normally do something else in the container screen, that will take precedence.
